original_text:
Yes, and from ancient days I am he.
No one can deliver out of my hand.
    When I act, who can reverse it?”
korean_text: 과연 태초로부터 나는 그이니 내 손에서 건질 자가 없도다 내가 행하리니 누가 막으리요

sentences.original_text: Yes, and from ancient days I am he
No one can deliver out of my hand
When I act, who can reverse it
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 행하면 이를 되돌이킬 자가 누구냐
